column5: ya i finally found it  in sudbury. CT has only had it for 3 weeks now! can someone  tell me how much i should  be putting in to 22L of gas plz  i'm confused on how much to put in there i believe the the bottle said 1-4 onces per gallon

That depends on what your doing with it. If your trying to clean the fuel system out, I'd put about a half a can in your tank, and burn it all. After that, an ounce or two/tank is fine for a stabilizer, and maintainer.  S.
